meanings.definition: To perfume with incense or other fragrant substance.
meanings.sent1: She will cense the room with a sweet-smelling incense.
meanings.sent2: During the ceremony, they cense the altar with a special fragrance.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to cense the kitchen with the aroma of freshly baked bread.
meanings.sent4: The flowers cense the garden with their natural perfume.
meanings.sent5: As she walked by, the breeze seemed to cense the air around her with a floral scent.

meanings.sent1: The cense of the flowers filled the room with a delightful scent.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new cense that reminded her of the ocean.
meanings.sent3: The bakery was filled with the cense of freshly baked cookies.
meanings.sent4: The morning air carried the cense of pine trees from the forest.
meanings.sent5: The cense of lavender in the garden was calming and soothing.
